solution_line_template: {white_marbles_original} of {total_marbles} marbles are white so there are {total_marbles}-{white_marbles_original} = {red_blue_marbles_total} red and blue marbles

The number of red marbles and blue marbles is the same, so there are {red_blue_marbles_total}/{divisor_for_equal_colors} = <<{red_blue_marbles_total}/{divisor_for_equal_colors}={marbles_per_color}>>{marbles_per_color} of each color

The difference between the number of white marbles and blue marbles is {white_marbles_original}-{marbles_per_color} = <<{white_marbles_original}-{marbles_per_color}={difference_white_blue}>>{difference_white_blue}
{marbles_removed} marbles are removed to leave {total_marbles}-{marbles_removed} = <<{total_marbles}-{marbles_removed}={marbles_left}>>{marbles_left} marbles
